General.Name: BW Ideol AS
General.Description: BW Ideol AS engages in the design, development, and execution of floating wind projects. The company provides floater engineering, procurement, construction, installation, and maintenance services; and develops wind-farm projects. It operates two offshore floating wind turbines in France and Japan. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in La Ciotat, France. BW Ideol AS is a subsidiary of BW Offshore Holdings PTE LTD.
